hero_title: Kul bint istahiq ta'lim wa mustaqbal zahi
mission_text: Li tamkin wa irshad al-fatayat wa al-banat fi janub al-sudan li yartaqi'n fawq al-hudud al-mujtama'iya min khilal al-ta'lim wa riwayat al-qisas wa al-irshad li yusa'idnahun 'ala idrak qimatihun wa bina' hayat mustaqilla wa wathiqa.
vision_text: Janub sudan haith kul bint takbar bi shaja'a wa ta'lim wa hadaf, hurra fi an tahlam wa taqud wa tughayir mujtama'ha.
goal_text: Bi hulul 2030, nahdifu li rabt 10,000 bint bi mawarid li furas al-bakalorius wa al-mu'tamarat wa al-tadrib.
help_reach_goal: Sa'idna fi wusul li hadafna bi:
joining_platform: Indimam li manasatna li ta'allum wa tawasul
spreading_word: Nashr al-kalima li wusul li banat aktar
new_opportunities: Furasa jadida qad idifat! Tafaqqad anha adnah.
no_opportunities: Lam tuhib ay furasa ba'd. Inqur 'ala bitaqat al-furasa li idafataha huna!
Upload projects, essays, videos and conn: Hamil al-mashari' wa al-maqalat wa al-videos wa itasil bi al-aqlaa wa al-murshidin
Describe your content, what you learned,: Wasif muhtawak, ma ta'allamt, aw ay tafsil turid an tasharik...
Share links from Google Docs, Drive, One: Sharik rawabil min Google Docs, Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox, wa ghayraha
Max file size: 100MB. Supports videos (~: Akbar hajm malaf: 100MB. Yad'am al-videos (~10 daqiqa HD), al-watha'iq, al-suwar, wa aktar.
File too large. Maximum size is 100MB: Al-malaf kabir jiddan. Al-hajm al-akbar huwa 100MB
Please add at least one external link: Rija' idafat rabil khariji wahid 'ala al-aqal
Khata' shabaka. Rija' al-muhawala marra ukhra.
Delete this comment? This action cannot: Haf hadha al-talik? Hadha al-'amal la yumkin 'aksuhu.
Delete this post? This action cannot be: Haf hadha al-manshur? Hadha al-'amal la yumkin 'aksuhu.
